p: Unlike respiratory presentations of ECoVs, which are well investigated, there is tiny existing knowledge on the neurologic presentations [16]. Hence, the knowledge of the novel ECoVs symptoms and case reporting need be advanced, aiming at creation of the infection control models and venture clinical trials for therapies advancements [17]. In such circumstances, this article is meant to contribute the understandings of the neurological manifestations of the ECoVs traversing the aspects of the epidermiologial data, clinical presentation, diagnostic considerations and the potential pharmacological options.
